entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 p.m. MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
